TopicTitle: Suggestion: Delay the Flight Report popping up on screen after a crash for a few seconds

Articles.Content:
Currently, the Flight Report window pops up in your screen within a milisecond of your root part crashing.

This window is HUGE, covering almost 1/2 of the entire screen, unabling you from observing your craft crash at all. The window it uses is huge for the little amount of info it carries.

My suggestions are:

1) Delay the time it takes for the Flight Report to show up on screen something like 3-5 seconds.
2) Condense the information in a smaller window that doesn't almost literally put a cover on the player's eyes. 

I want to see my explosions. Everyone wants to see their explosions.

Free explosions!
